divs: Sighting DetailsMy children and I were coming home from church on a road that is in the country surrounded by farmland. All of the sudden I see a huge green and blue and red explosion of light off to my right. It was massive. My oldest daughter saw it too. I stopped the car on the road to keep looking at it. Next, a large white light zoomed across the sky faster than anything I have ever seen. Now I live by the airport and see alot of planes and this was no plane, I dont think it was a shooting star it went level with the ground all the way over to where the explosion of light happened. I drove about a mile down that road and then about a mile to the left twoard my home and when I pulled up in the driveway I saw a huge green and blue ball of light disappear over the trees behind my house. Now when I say huge in here I mean big. A plane is like a tiny spec in the sky and this was twenty or thirty times larger than that. I am not really into the alien thing, but I saw what I saw.I called the National weather service today and thv news and no other reports were called in. I know someone else had to see this. I don't think it could have been a meteor shower, I have looked at some photos online. I went back outside for a few minutes to see something else I was so amazed but I didn't see anything.
Summary: Large green and blue glowing lights and large white very fast light
